name: asoos-ui
description: ASOOS UI with Integration Gateway and CTTT

scripts.stop: node -e "if(require('fs').existsSync('process.pid')) { console.log('Stopping ASOOS UI...'); process.kill(parseInt(require('fs').readFileSync('process.pid', 'utf-8')), 'SIGTERM'); } else { console.log('ASOOS UI is not running'); }"
